fields.name: content
fields.value:
1. Check your internet connection and ensure it is stable.
 2. Verify that the endpoint URL in the YAML file is correct and matches the actual URL of your application.
 3. Confirm that the user agent and headers are configured correctly in the YAML file.
 4. If using an NGINX reverse proxy, make sure that the upstream server (your application) is running and accessible.
 5. If the problem persists, consider checking for any error messages or logs generated by the application or NGINX reverse proxy that may provide more information about the cause of the issue.

If you continue to experience issues, please let me know, and I will be happy to help further.
